snippet: The Suzanne Farrell Ballet opens the fall season, which includes Missy Mazzoli and Royce Vavrek’s opera, “Breaking the Waves.”
abstract: NYU Skirball Center for the Performing Arts announces its 2016-2017 season, which includes offerings in ballet, opera and circus arts.
lead_paragraph: The Suzanne Farrell Ballet opens the fall season, which includes Missy Mazzoli and Royce Vavrek’s opera, “Breaking the Waves.”

headline.main: N.Y.U. Skirball Center Season Features Circus Arts, Ballet and Opera
headline.print_headline: Ballet, Opera and More in Skirball Season
